description.@en: Bargaining runs through my veins, and without the thrill of haggling, negotiating and debating, life would not be fun—or even worth living!

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Whenever you fail a Bargain or Rumor Test, you may re-roll to generate a better result but must accept the outcome. In addition, you always succeed at Skill Tests to haggle down prices for legal wares & weapons.
